title: A Challenge to Mark Cavendish: 2024 Will Be the Most Competitive Sprint Season in Years
content:
Sprinting in spring will set the tone as a phalanx of fast-finishers line up to derail Cavendish's chase for Tour de France history.

Read the full article at A Challenge to Mark Cavendish: 2024 Will Be the Most Competitive Sprint Season in Years on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
